label: Given
documentation: Given step is the initial context at the beginning of the scenario.

label: When
documentation: When step is the event that generally triggers the scenario.

label: Then
documentation: Then step is generally used for the expected outcome.

label: And
documentation: And step is used to add additional steps to a given scenario

label: actions
documentation: actios keyword is used to perform the series for interactions require for given scenrios

label: do
documentation: do perform some interact which work on components or starting test

label: click
documentation: click on component by interacting with its given identifier

label: type
documentation: type on component by interacting with its given identifier by providing its value
